__e: Well, okay. Nobody said Orgasmic Living was easy, ladies.
I was just thinking about what you said earlier about enjoying the peace while it lasts.
- He did. He said he was going to start enjoying his life, with neither me nor the children.
Oh, but that does not mean and should not mean that we do not remember how to enjoy what comes our way.
You know like going on vacations or taking the time to enjoy this life is not, you know, not the goal.
You see how damaging it is for people to not... to be in something like this and not be able to have children, to not have a real relationship, to not be enjoying their lives, really.
